nodes.excerpt: FEED is the new social video app that makes idea-sharing more fun! Talk to anyone, anywhere, in real-time, & make collective movies. No more typing - FEEDâ€™s co-streaming function is the new way to chat & collaborate. Share your ideas; join a new feed today!

nodes.excerpt: Editr automatically adds near perfect subtitles to your video. Enhance your video and captivate those who watch your content on mute. Upload your video, then watch our machine learning and AI transcribe your video in a matter of minutes.
